name: Candy Cane Sparkle
description:
A classic childhood Christmas favorite, Candy Cane! This refreshing bar of handmade shea butter soap  smells of cool crisp mint with a hint of sweet vanilla topped of with a sprinkle of snow. 

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5- 5.3 oz

name: Carmel Apple Cider
description:
This limited edition soap smells of warm baked apples mixed with some comforting cinnamon and a hint of butter. Smells amazing and good enough to eat!

--------------------------------------------------------------
This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5oz

name: Pumpkin Spice Soap
description:
This bar smells of fresh pumpkin with notes of warm cinnamon, sweet brown sugar and a hint of comforting vanilla.

This soap has actual pumpkin puree in it. Not only does it give the bar a beautiful colour but it is also full of antioxidants and vitamins A, C & E giving your skin a vibrant, healthy glow.

This listing is for a 5oz bar of handmade soap labelled with 100% recycled materials.

Ingredients: coconut oil, palm oil, vegetable oil, castor oil, water, lye, shea butter, skin safe fragrance, pumpkin puree & cinnamon 

-----------------------------------------------------------

Thank you Vanessa! Love your soap stuff!!! :))))
-Monica
Toronto, Canada

name: Coffee Kitchen
description:
This unscented bar of soap is guaranteed to remove all cooking odors including onions and garlic! 
Strong brewed coffee is used instead of our usual reverse osmosis H2O and also coffee grounds to gently exfoliate and remove the "kitchen stink"

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5-5.3 oz

name: Dharma
description:
Keep your karma clean and positive with a little help every morning from this spicy bar of soap. 

Scented naturally with cinnamon, patchouli, orange and eucalyptus essential oils. Coloured naturally with cinnamon and turmeric.

Chemical, preservative and paraben-free, no artificial colours or scents!
-----------------------------------------------------------
This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5oz

name: ZEN Garden
description:
ZEN Garden is a 100% natural shea butter soap created with a relaxing blend of lavender, lemongrass and orange essential oils and coloured using alkanet root to make bathing a meditative and calming experience. 

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5- 5.3 oz, 
-----------------------------------------------------------

Your soap is amazing just love it! My skin feels so soft after my shower and the soap aroma just fills my room.

Thanks Lorraine

name: Honey Beer Soap
description:
Made using Guinness beer and a dollop of local Ontario honey to give your skin a soft healthy glow . This all natural soap is scented with the fresh invigorating scent of grapefruit, lemon, orange and palmarosa essential oils. Great gift for that hard to shop for, beer loving man in your life. 

-----------------------------------------------------------

I LOVE this soap! The suds are so rich and thick, and the SMELL is phenomenal! Thank you, Soulful Soap!
~ Shirley -Hamilton, On

name: Organic Green Tea + Eucalyptus
description:
The liquid in this handmade bar of soap has been replaced with organic brewed green tea which is rich in antioxidants. Green tea helps aid in the reduction of inflammation of the skin caused by irritants. Studies also suggest that it helps to build the skins elastin which prevent the aging of skin and the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles !!

Eucalyptus essential oil has many benefits such as antimicrobial and antibacterial. It also has natural invigorating effects that help to cure mental fatigue and body exhaustion. What a perfect combination to start your day!

100%  Natural cold process vegan soap

Chemical, preservative and paraben free, no artificial colours or scents!

------------------------------------------------------------
This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately  5 oz

name: 25 Custom CupCake Soap
description:
These cute cupcake soaps make the perfect favor for any event!!

These shea butter soaps are handmade with love in any custom colour and scent tailored to your event. Cupcake soaps are the same size as the edible kind and even topped with a dusting of sparkles. 

They come packed in a cello bag with a raffia tie or corresponding ribbon as well as a custom label!

**Listing is for 25 customs full size cupcakes**

name: Custom Soap Cake
description:
This listing if for a fully custom 3.5lb soap cake. You pick the scent and colour and amount of slices, the average is 16 good size pieces.

What a unique way to say "Thank you" with the gift of handmade soap. Display it on a cake stand and then hand each guest a slice as they leave.


 Perfect for Wedding, bridal and baby shower favors!
Each slice comes packaged in a cello bag with a custom label.

**Scents Available**

Blueberry muffin
Banana nut
carrot cake
coconut lime
    or
Any soap scent found in the Soulful Soap online shop!!

Cake colour can be wedding colours or whatever your soul desires.

**Please allow 5 weeks to make custom soap cake**

name: Coconut Lime
description:
This bar of soap will turn any bath time into an all inclusive vacation. The coconut lime combo will have you swimming in the ocean sipping margarita's while you shampoo your hair.

**Suntan not included**


Due to the artistic nature of handmade soap, colours and swirls on each bar may vary.

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5-5.3 oz

name: Sandelwood Amber
description:
This homemade shea butter soap is a fantastic scent for your favorite man. 

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5-5.3 oz

name: Clear Complexion Facial Bar
description:
This fantastic facial bar contains activated charcoal and a blend of tea tree, patchouli and lemon essential oils. Works wonders to control and clear acne breakouts!

Activated charcoal acts like a magnet to pull dirty and excess oil out of pores while gently exfoliating. Skin will look clear, refreshed and rejuvenated!

Tea tree is great for treating and preventing acne as well as keeping oily skin as bay.  

Patchouli is a natural astringent and shrinks pores.

Lemon essential oil makes dull skin lustrous again as well as detoxifies.

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5 oz

name: Olive Oil
description:
100% natural bar of soap no artificial colours or scents. Made with pure Mediterranean olive oil. Great for babies and people with sensitive skin. 

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5-5.3 oz

name: Hand & Body Lotion 4oz/ 125ml
description:
Treat your skin with our silky, luxurious hand and body lotion. Our smooth nourishing formula  is enriched with sweet almond oil, avocado oil and cocoa butter.

Please choose your scent in the drop down menu.

Zen Garden- Scented with the essential oils of lavender, lemongrass and orange essential oils. This is a blend that is widely used in aromatherapy to promote calmness and relaxation

Citrus Bliss- A refreshing vibrant scent of satsuma and mandarin oranges blended with a subtle hint of jasmine flowers.

Warm Vanilla- A comforting blend of brown sugar and sweet vanilla.

Pumpkin Spice-  Fresh pumpkin with notes of warm cinnamon, sweet brown sugar and a hint of comforting vanilla

Caramel Apple Cider- Sweet baked apple topped with sticky caramel and warm cinnamon.

Ingredients: reverse osmosis H2O, sweet almond oil, avocado oil, cocoa butter, steric acid (from palm oil), emulsifying wax, potassium sorbate (food preservative)

This listing if for 4oz/ 125ml of lotion

name: Hand & Body Lotion 8oz/250ml
description:
Treat your skin with our silky, luxurious hand and body lotion. Our smooth nourishing formula  is enriched with sweet almond oil, avocado oil and cocoa butter.

Please choose your scent in the drop down menu.

Zen Garden- Scented with the essential oils of lavender, lemongrass and orange essential oils. This is a blend that is widely used in aromatherapy to promote calmness and relaxation

Citrus Bliss- A refreshing vibrant scent of satsuma and mandarin oranges.

Warm Vanilla- A comforting blend of brown sugar and sweet vanilla.

Pumpkin Spice-  Fresh pumpkin with notes of warm cinnamon, sweet brown sugar and a hint of comforting vanilla

Caramel Apple- Sweet baked apple topped with sticky caramel and warm cinnamon.

Ingredients: reverse osmosis H2O, sweet almond oil, avocado oil, cocoa butter, steric acid (from palm oil), emulsifying wax, potassium sorbate (food preservative)

This listing if for 8oz/ 250ml of lotion

name: Lip Balm
description:
This lip balm is designed to keep your lips moisturized and kissable at all times. This simple lip balm has an ingredient list you can pronounce and count on one hand!

Our lip balms glides on smooth and leaves your lips with a subtle shine that gets soaked in for a true, long lasting moisturizing effect.

Our lip balms have no sweetener added to them therefor they have no taste

Ingredients: olive oil, mango butter, cocoa butter, beeswax, all natural organic flavor oils and/or essential oils.

Scents Available

French Vanilla-  Vanilla bean infused oils used,-all natural

Lavender Lemon- Lavender & lemon essential oils used-all natural

Mango Peach- Sweet mango and Juicy peach

Snowflake- Cooling mint

Gingerbread- Sweet Gingerbread cookie with a hint of royal icing.

name: Warm Vanilla Oatmeal Bar
description:
This oatmeal bar smells of warm comforting vanilla, sweet brown sugar and a hint of musk. Blended with fine oatmeal powder throughout the entire bar and a final dusting of oatmeal on top. 
This delicate scent is perfect for both men and woman.

This listing is for 1 bar of soap. Each generous bar is hand-cut and weighs approximately 5 oz

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I just got my soap in the mail!!! Delivery was fast, and totally worth the wait (even though I hardly had to). I got the Warm Vanilla Oatmeal bar and the Buttercream cupcake soap, they both smell sooo good!! I can't wait to use them! Thanks! Soulful Soap is awesome!!!"
                                                                                       Kristina
                                                                                  New Brunswick
                                                                                       Canada
